title: Comedy Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1969 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the April 1942 issue, and was filed in 1969.
Volume numbering went from 2 back to 1 beginning with number 32, while issue numbering continued to increment.
This serial should not be confused with 'Comedy', a digest-sized comics magazine from the same publishers that published a total of 6 issues in 1942 and 1943.
